verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: By the growing brightness of the morning.
verse.verse_2: And by the night when it covers.
verse.verse_3: Your Lord has not forsaken you, nor He was disgust.
verse.verse_4: And undoubtedly, the following one is better for you than the preceding one.
verse.verse_5: And undoubtedly, soon your Lord shall give you so much that you shall be satisfied.
verse.verse_6: Did He not find you an orphan, then gave you shelter?
verse.verse_7: And He found you drown in His Love, therefore gave way unto Him.
verse.verse_8: And He found you needy so He enriched you.
verse.verse_9: So put not pressure over orphan.
verse.verse_11: And publicize well the favours of your Lord.
